I hate it.

10/10

топовая игра для настоящих гачистов усатых

Personally, I enjoy this game at its moments.  I truly do.  My issue when it comes to this game is the Fun part.  You can't have a game anymore without a Sweaty teams, or a killer that is Fully set up in perks and add-ons.  With killers coming out over powered, Or with an over powered Kit at launch.  Takes them 3-4 months it feels like at times to "Adjust" them.  Killers like Pig Just Got Thrown under the Bus after her nerfs.  Even with the Add-on Changes for her which are to help her, Just feel like they're Slowing her down a tad.  Especially with the Bug with her New Iri Add-on.  This game was fun, It still can be, But its Very rare to have a game where you can actually sit back and enjoy the game, and not Try to play like a pro player.  

     In Short, They Had an amazing game, Then Ruined it with all the Bugs they've refused to fix, or let go un fixed.  Killers Coming out with a powerful kit, or an underdone kit. Matchmaking is Not fun anymore.  Feels like the Devs Care VERY Little about our opinions.
this game is a bit scary

No matter what you do, you will get shit on. 
All players are bad, all players are mad, behaviour exclusively nerf them and buff others, it's a whine-tasting seminar and YOU are invited. Game itself can be fun, but the "community" and "culture" (insofar as you can call it a culture) is absolutely dogshit.

Play it with friends exclusively, and you can have fun. Nobody is happy in public games.

Esta belezura desse jogo não cria um matchmaking decente que preste, e ficou pior depois dessa atualização de ranking, você ta no rank mais baixo do jogo e cai com uns cara de rank 1, olha que coisa legal, imagina quem ta chegando agora pra jogar, so vai cair com gente de boa indole né? hahaha
Se você ainda preza pela sua sanidade e seu bom humor diário não compre esta maravilha de jogo, sim eu tenho mais de 600 horas desse jogo, mas eu não me orgulho.
Зашел в игру, покушал, спасибо большое. Дай бог здоровья разработчикам!
Mega podoba mi się moja ulubiona postać to yasuo
yes, this game is like cbt

Ну что могу сказать, игра конченная дисбаллансная помойка, с разработчиками xyеcocaми. К покупке не советую, а особенно не советую в неё донатить, ибо если разработчикам захочется, они могут выдать вам бан просто так, без объяснения причины и вы просто так потеряете деньги.
Стань Гитлером, зачеши челку налево, можно и направо, приставь два пальца под нос, и ты прям как Адольф Гитлер.
mt bom, recomendo pra krl, só fique preparados para as inumeras atts kkkk
Das Spiel hat definitiv einen Suchtfaktor, auch wenn nicht immer alle Runden gut verlaufen, ist es trotzdem ein gutes und empfehlenswertes Spiel.

worth the money if you like the game and its very fun to play only when you have friends
if you are alone idk its fun but not as fun
Once you get past the toxic community and the terrible hit boxes. It can be quite fun and makes for some entertaining evenings.

Terrible fixes, disgusting patching methods, for one bug fix you'll have to redownload the whole game as "file alteration", patches take fucking hours and the devs dont give a goat's ass about the community, the players, or the preferences and demands of the player base... Glitchy game filled with bugs, terrible game design, and no effort or intention in making this pile of shit a better game instead of sitting on millions of dollars. Fuck this company, fuck the devs, and fuck Mathieu Coté. Pretty good job so far....

O jogo é bom, o que falta mesmo é a Behaviour se preocupar em balancear o jogo, alguns bonecos como Pinhead e Legion estão ridículos de fracos e mesmo assim até agora nada foi feito, o pinhead mal lançou e já tomou um nerf mesmo sendo um killer fraco... Só espero que eles se preocupem em dar buff ou reworkar pra acabar logo com essa palhaçada. PELO AMOR DE DEUS BEHAVIOUR DÁ UM BUFF NO LEGIONNNNNNN
ублюдская игра в которой всегда побеждают сурвы т.к на каждой ебучей карте по 100 досок и окон ещё ... все на стороне сурвов
la verdad es un buen juego

If i were to point out everything that's wrong with DBD and Behaviour Interactive, i'd be writing this all day and night. 

I've never seen a less competent team of Developers, ever. 
So many bad design/balancing choices and utter laziness it's actually incredible.

Yes I have wasted a lot of hours on this game, as there was nothing like it in the genre, it is addictive in a sense, but horrible and unrewarding.

They don't care about the game and neither should you.
非常好玩，但是为什么我青铜屠夫把把和红段人类打。
